abstract: An article on June 17 about the increasing use of debit and credit cards for small purchases referred incorrectly to the overall value of such transactions. According to research by MasterCard, transactions of less than $5 totaled $1.32 trillion, not billion, last year.

lead_paragraph: An article on June 17 about the increasing use of debit and credit cards for small purchases referred incorrectly to the overall value of such transactions. According to research by MasterCard, transactions of less than $5 totaled $1.32 trillion, not billion, last year.

headline.main: Who Needs Pocket Change When You’ve Got Plastic?
